mapper.sql: article_id, article_status, article_created, article_title, article_summery, article_content, article_htmlContent, article_url, article_reading, article_commentscount, article_likescount
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_article
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_article
article_id,
article_status,
article_created,
article_title,
article_summery,
article_content,
article_htmlContent,
article_url,
article_reading,
article_commentscount,
article_likescount,

mapper.update:
update t_article
article_id = #{record.articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_status = #{record.articleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
article_created = #{record.articleCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
article_title = #{record.articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

article_commentscount = #{record.articleCommentscount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_likescount = #{record.articleLikescount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update t_article
article_status = #{articleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
article_created = #{articleCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
article_title = #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

article_commentscount = #{articleCommentscount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_likescount = #{articleLikescount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
